column6: The United Front led by NOVA, RONAN and DRAX have held, but only just. ANNIHILUS' forces have been fought to a standstill. But can any defense withstand the devastating attack of RAVENOUS and the CENTURIONS?
column8: | penciller (cover):Gabriele Dell'Otto | writer:Keith Giffen | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Laura Villari | penciller:Andrea Di Vito
